title: The Trials of life: a natural history of behaviour. - Part 2.
brief_description: Six half hour episodes on animal behaviour addressing survival, reproduction and communication. 1. “Finding the way” on sense of direction in animals, especially migratory birds. 2. “Fighting” 3. “Friends & rivals” on animals living co-operatively in communities, particularly lions and baboons. 4. “Talking to strangers” - communication between species, including animal to human. 5. “Courting” 6. “Continuing the line” Narrated by renowned British naturalist, David Attenborough.
